participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, with a tendency to be introverted and sensitive. Enjoys fantasy worlds and expresses individuality through changing hair colors.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Playful and outgoing, with a quirky sense of humor. Enjoys socializing and engaging in unique hobbies.
participant_2.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.
